item.title: What If AI Goes Rogue? This Startup Wants to Write the Insurance Policy
item.description: With hallucinating chatbots, deepfakes, and algorithmic accidents on the rise, AIUC says the solution to building safer models is pricing the risks.

item.title: Hands-free Sneaker-Maker Kizik Just Sued Skechers
item.description: The company alleges that Sketchers violated its patents for slip-on shoes.

item.title: Your Sales Team Needs Your Voice More Than Your Pitch Deck
item.description: Prioritize visibility not for recognition, but to accelerate outcomes that matter.

item.title: Integrate Rewards into the SaaS Customer Journey
item.description: Embed meaningful incentives into key touchpoints to differentiate your service.

item.title: OpenAI’s GPT-5, Expected Next Month, Could Steal the Vibe-Coding Crown from Anthropic
item.description: OpenAI’s next model promises to be a big deal, and it could be here as soon as August.
